item.title: command-line text editor learnings
item.description: What I learned while making a command-line text editor from scratch in C? ![[img/nin.png]] Ordinarily, I do not create such low-level projects, but as I was getting more inclined towards systems-programming I had to do something to get my feet wet in this domain.

item.title: File Architecture in C
item.description: Cleaning C code to maintain sanity ![[img/cc.jpeg]] I, am the kind of person who can ignore scattered and untidy surroundings, but when it comes to messy code, I cannot resist cleaning and refactoring it.

item.title: From Concept to Reality: Crafting an ImplicitList Heap Allocator
item.description: Before getting started we need to take a pause and think about what is a heap allocator. What does it do?
